snippet: The bank kept its benchmark interest rate at 0.5 percent, even as some economists warned that the recovery was encouraging but might not be sustainable.

byline.original: By JULIA WERDIGIER and STEPHEN CASTLE

lead_paragraph: The bank kept its benchmark interest rate at 0.5 percent, even as some economists warned that the recovery was encouraging but might not be sustainable.

headline.main: Bank of England Holds Rate at Already Low Level
headline.print_headline: Bank of England Holds Rate at Already Low Level
